ModulePrefs.title: Announcements Rotating Banners
ModulePrefs.description: Display a rotating banner image from a google sites anouncements page.
ModulePrefs.author: Raigosa.com Software Development Independent Contracting Services

UserPref.name: feedURL
UserPref.display_name: Google feedburner URL (empty values will use default scripted value).

UserPref.name: bannerSpeed
UserPref.display_name: Set the banner sliding speed (micro seconds).

UserPref.name: bannerPause
UserPref.display_name: Set the banner pause time(micro seconds).

UserPref.name: feedPerBanner
UserPref.display_name: Set the number of announcements on each banner.

UserPref.name: feedLimit
UserPref.display_name: Maximum number of announcements to read from the feed.

UserPref.name: showerrors
UserPref.display_name: Display an error message when there are problems.

UserPref.name: debug
UserPref.display_name: Display debug information (any value will do to turn this on).
